data.name: Hunan University of Arts and Sciences
Hunan Institute of Water Resources and Hydropower Research Personnel Records Management System
data.desc: Personnel file management system of the Academy of Water Sciences is a computer system that adopts the technologies of electronic archives, image digitization, paperless office and information networking to realize the storage and query and retrieval of multimedia archive resources including archive documents, sound, image and text, providing an effective technical guarantee for the management, utilization and protection of archive materials, infinitely prolonging the preservation time of the archive materials, and bringing convenience to the access and utilization of the archive documents. data.desc: For drivers who hold the Road Transportation Qualification Certificate and are engaged in the transportation of passengers, ordinary goods and dangerous goods, online registration, training and graduation are conducted through PC and mobile terminals, and training, learning, assessment and scoring are conducted through video exercises.

data.name: TaoLaw (Ali Law)
data.desc: online legal platform, which provides a platform for lawyers, teams and consultants to communicate and handle, as well as legal information. Lawyers can obtain the source of cases published by consultants through the platform, and they can publish personal information trends and articles. Consultants can choose lawyers to go to court through the platform, and they can view legal information and laws and regulations.

Third-party login and docking of WeChat, QQ and Sina

data.name: Crowd Supervision System
data.desc: a system for managing special people. The system can realize the high-precision real-time positioning and management of key personnel by the staff of relevant departments through PC and mobile devices by wearing bracelet equipment. GPS/ Beidou positioning is adopted to realize real-time position data, and managers with different authorities can view the real-time position, abnormal situation, aggregation warning, hurdle alarm, personal situation and other data of all monitored objects in their corresponding authority areas.
duty: Front-end and back-end framework construction, database design, server-side interface based on rest, PC and Android to provide data interface
Back-end aggregation and fence crossing algorithm implementation, front-end positioning map display implementation, fence editing component implementation, action track display
communications monitoring capability
Device Docking, Huawei NB-IOT Docking
UI design, large screen homepage design and code implementation
Optimization improvements

data.name: 636 Enterprise Title Invoice System
data.desc: In accordance with the overall requirements of “simplifying the types of invoices, unifying the invoices, establishing a platform, and issuing on the network”, the enterprise title invoice system is constructed, which consists of three parts: enterprise invoicing client, invoice backend service terminal, and enterprise invoice management terminal, and realizes the functions of invoice purchase management, invoice distribution management, invoice item management, invoice balance management, invoice issuing on the network, and invoice checking and old payment and cancellation. It realizes the functions of invoice purchase management, invoice distribution management, invoice item management, invoice balance management, invoice network issuance, invoice checking, old payment and cancellation, establishes the long-term closed-loop management mechanism of invoices, and intensifies the supervision on the use of invoices of the enterprises, so as to avoid the tax-related risks brought by illegal violations.
duty: Invoice entry, invoice printing, invoice preview, front and back end implementation
Complex Invoice Item Entry Plugin Implementation
Dropdown selector componentization
paging componentization
Page design
Maintenance of back-end related functions

data.name: Hunan State Tax Horizontal Networking V
data.desc: The operation and maintenance management system of Hunan State Tax Horizontal Networking Phase V provides the operation and maintenance personnel with the monitoring of the interaction information processing between horizontal networking and TIPS, which includes the monitoring of active interaction messages with TIPS, the monitoring of passive acceptance of TIPS notification messages, the querying and processing of abnormal data, the control of starting and stopping of the tax payment mode of the horizontal networking, and the checking of the tax payment situation of the background of the horizontal networking, etc., so as to provide the operation and maintenance personnel with more complete monitoring and operation and maintenance services. The functions of monitoring and maintenance include
duty: Manual reconciliation module, manual warehousing module
Clearing house line number maintenance module
Horizontal networking back-office inspection module
CUP FTP Detail File and Horizontal Networking Log Cleanup Function
Operation parameter notification, status change notification

data.name: Tax-Value-Management System (TVMS)
data.desc: Tax Silver Pass, tax-controlled cash register remote tax reporting and payment system, is divided into the front system and business system. 1, the front system is mainly responsible for interacting with the terminal access server, receiving and forwarding the terminal data to the business system and issuing commands to the terminal; 2, the business system is mainly responsible for receiving the data from the front system, relying on the general staff system, horizontal networking and other systems, the user's tax copy, reporting and payment of taxes. The business system is mainly responsible for receiving the data from the predecessor system and relying on the general reference system and horizontal networking system to process the tax copy and declaration, declaration and tax payment of users.
duty: safeguard
